name: Must Be Covered By Endpoint Of
description: The points in the input layer must be covered by the ends of lines in the coverage layer
so points errors are created on the points that are not covered by the ends of lines.
For example, this rule is useful when is needed that street intersections must be covered
by the endpoints of street centerlines.

DeletePoint.name: Delete Point
description: This action delete the point errors
Delete Point action, delete the entities that do not comply the rule
This action removes point features that are not coincident
with the endpoint of line features, so points errors are created
on the points that are not covered by the ends of lines.
